Hi, I'm James Cool and I'm a web developer. I'm interested in task runners, scaffolding tools, responsive design, and templating languages. I like JavaScript. In my spare time, I write music in order to keep myself away from philosophy.

To see some of my current projects, experiments, and miscellaneous exercises, please visit me on GitHub or npm. If you're interested in seeing other things I've done, visit jeffreysbrother.com. You can also find me on Treehouse.

if you have any questions or if you suspect that I might be able to assist you in some way, feel free to email me at . This is the best way to contact me if your inquiry pertains to programming or technology. While I tend to be busy, I'm interested in collaborating on open source projects.

A current version of my résumé is available here.
